title: Immediate move in availability! CALL NOW!!
posting_body: Crystal Court Apartments is a modern day community featuring two bed room apartment homes located near the strip and minutes away from downtown and the Convention Center.
We are currently doing community tours and would love to show you around.
We have a spacious two bedroom apartment home with all electric appliances; vinyl, ceramic and carpet flooring options, bar area, stackable washer and dryer, etc.
It is a roommate style layout with a lot of space.

We are a secured midrise building with security that walks our community daily, our residents have FOB access controls to enter, fitness center, pool and barbecue areas with a gated parking garage as well.
Come by our office at 900 E. Desert Inn Rd.
and we would love to assist you in finding your new home with us.
You will love living at our beautiful community!
If you have any questions, please call our office at
and/or check our website to apply at <URL>
